# Ironthunder Horn (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]] \[[[Sonic Spells|sonic]]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Bard Spells|Bard 1]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 4th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** 30 ft.

**Area:** Cone-shaped burst

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Reflex negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 126

*The last words of your spell boom out with a thundering roar, knocking the foes in your path off their feet.*

You create a deep resonant vibration that can shake creatures off their feet. Creatures in the area must succeed on a Reflex saving throw or fall prone.
